resource.description: A disk image containing Ubuntu 20.04 for ARM which will run an `m5 readfile` instruction after booting. If no script file is specified an `m5 exit` instruction will be executed.
resource.name: arm64 ubuntu 20.04 img

workloads.description: A full boot of Ubuntu 20.04 with Linux 5.4.49 for ARM64. It runs an `m5 exit` command when the boot is completed unless the readfile is specified. If specified the readfile will be executed after booting.
workloads.name: arm64 ubuntu 20.04 boot
